devdoc.details: Contract for generating trade quotes for the Seer trade manager.

quoteMintSingle((address,address,address.details: Generates a quote for minting full set of market outcome tokens, keep desired outcome tokens while trying to sell the rest to re-buy more desired tokens.

returns.amountOut: Total amount of output tokens after minting + selling/re-buying.

quoteSwapSingle((address,address,address.details: Generates a quote for swapping tokens.
